dataList.title: Punish the You branch Heishou.
successDesc:
"So I should take the Heishou's talons because they couldn't be responsible with them, huh?"

As per {0}'s advice, Xichun took the Heishou's dagger.

"Your will is my command, my lord..."

The Heishou of the You branch handed over the dagger, looking like they were giving up a very important part of themselves.

"I'll give 'em back to you after you think long and hard about what you've done wrong."

Xichun seems satisfied.
failureDesc:
"... What? That's stupid."

Xichun, clearly dissatisfied with {0}'s advice, commands the Heishou to... detention.

"Your will is my command. No same incident shall ever occur again, I promise."

The Heishou of the You branch gladly tied their own arms together.

... Xichun doesn't seem to find this resolution satisfying.

dataList.title: Suspicious Red Cloth
successDesc:
"Really...? That dirty thing...? Well, I mean, I'll give it to you if you want, but..."

Xichun gladly handed the piece of cloth over to {0} upon their request.

"Well, if you need anything other than that creepy red cloth, don't hesitate."

... Some Sinners immediately perked up as though they were about to hound her with a list of demands, so I had put my foot down. ... Which I barely managed.

The red cloth was already tied around {0}'s wrist.
failureDesc:
"Really...? That dirty thing...? Well, I mean, I'll give it to you if you want, but..."

Xichun gladly handed the piece of cloth over to {0} upon their request.

"Huh...?"

Bud oddly enough, the piece of cloth melted away to nothingness the moment {0} grabbed it.

What was that about?

dataList.title: Someone fenced Heishou Pack - Wu Branch gear
successDesc:
B-but I was sure these gear didn't belong to anyone—agh, forget it."

The merchant, who was completely fooled by {0}'s words, handed over the Heishou gear to us for free.

"These... according to confirmed information, bear a resemblance to the gear of the "Wu" branch.

Looks like we just got ourselves some lost Heishou Pack - Wu Branch gear.
failureDesc:
"You scoundrels! Did you really think you'd be able to convince me with a lie like that?!"

"W-wait, listen. You listen here, fella—"

The merchant saw right through {0}'s lies, and grew furious.

We quickly made ourselves scarce before things got out of hand.
